name: Missionary’s Downfall
recipeIngredient: 1/2 ring of peeled pineapple cut 1/2-inch thick, core removed
1 tablespoon (1/2 ounce) peach liqueur, preferably Leopold Brothers or Mathilde
2 tablespoons (1 ounce) clear rum, more if necessary

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a blender with about 1 1/2 cups ice. Purée until smooth. If too thick, add a little pineapple juice or extra rum, to taste. It should look like a slushy mint pesto. Pour into a chilled cocktail glass or goblet, and serve with a straw snipped to rise 2 to 3 inches above rim of glass.
